data.title: Famous Weddings & Divorces in February 2007
data.meta_description: Famous weddings and divorces in February 2007. See which famous celebrities and historical figures married and divorced in Feb 2007.
data.text:
Famous Weddings

American "Jackass" prankster Bam Margera (27) weds Missy Rothstein (26) in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; divorce in 2012

Feb 3 Winner of "Strictly Come Dancing and "Eastenders" actress Jill Halfpenny (31) weds actor Craig Conway (32) at St. Andrew's Church in Newcastle

"Rudo y Cursi" Mexican actor Diego Luna (28) weds actress and model Camila Sodi (21) in Mexico City

Former Atomic Kitten member Kerry Katona (26) weds Mark Croft in Gretna Green

Keri Russell

Former Felicity actress Keri Russell (30) weds longtime boyfriend Shane Deary (30) in NYC, New York

"Home and Away" actress Ada Nicodemou (29) weds Chrys Xipolitas at St. Andrew's Greek church in Redfern, Australia

Feb 17 Australian TV presenter Natalie Gruzlewski (30) weds pro surfer Luke Egan at St. Augustine's Catholic Church

Feb 17 Japanese actress Noria Fujiwara weds comedian Tomonori at Jinnai Ikuta Shrine in Kobe, Japan

Marion Jones

American former world champion track and field athlete Marion Jones (31) weds Barbadian Olympic sprinting bronze medalist Obadele Thompson (30) at the Union Hill African Methodist Episcopal Church in Wilson's Mills, North Carolina

Famous Divorces

"Married ... With Children" actor David Faustino (32) divorces actress Andrea Elmer Faustino (31) due to irreconcilable differences after 3 years of marriage

Carmen Electra

"Baywatch" actress Carmen Electra (34) divorces rocker Dave Navarro (39) due to irreconcilable differences after less than three years of marriage
